name: Gaop - Reward 1$

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx650
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Use the up, down, left and right buttons to control the player to push the box to the designated position to pass the level. If you want to restart the level, please long press Left Control. If you want to quit the game, please long press ESC.
